title: Updated Chic Community! High End Finishes! Hardwood Floors!
posting_body: It’s time to wipe the slate clean and redefine luxury living.
Featuring one- and two-bedroom apartments with fabulous amenities (like fitness centers and a pool) and a walkable neighborhood.
Newly constructed fitness centers, which have cardio and weightlifting machines, as well as a spacious floor plan for other workouts.
We also have a resort-style pool, which has beautifully decorated seating areas nearby, in addition to BBQ grills and accent lighting.
Resident clubhouse is equipped with Starbucks coffee and free Wi-Fi.
Other amenities of our luxury apartments include gated access, package lockers, updated interior hallways and meticulously maintained landscaping with gardens.
Please Call Desiree with DASH Realty
If you have pets, you’ll be happy to know that we allow up to two per home and welcome a variety of cat and dog breeds.
Your pets are sure to love the pet stations on site in addition to the aforementioned walking trails.
